isValidHashSignature(bytes32,address,byt.details: Check that `hash` was signed by `signer` given `signature`.

params.signature: The signature. The last byte of this signature should        be a member of the `SignatureType` enum.

validateHashSignature(bytes32,address,by.details: Validate that `hash` was signed by `signer` given `signature`.      Reverts otherwise.

params.signature: The signature. The last byte of this signature should        be a member of the `SignatureType` enum.
